name: Sacred 2 Gold

files.sacred2: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- sacred2: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
- d9vk: https://github.com/Joshua-Ashton/d9vk/releases/download/0.12/d9vk-0.12.tar.gz
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Sacred 2 Gold/system/sacred2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/d9vk-0.12/
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-0.12/
    src: $CACHE/d9vk-0.12/
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: sacred2
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  MouseWarpOverride: enable
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.12
  overrides:
    msvcp140: native
  version: tkg-protonified-4.6-x86_64
